relaylist.title: Your Relays
relaylist.description: Relays are hubs for your content and connections. At least one is required to interact with the network, but you can join as many as you like.
relaylist.otherdesc: Below are relays used by people in your network. Adding these may improve your ability to load profiles and content.
relaylist.modaldesc: Enter a relay url below to add it to your relay selections.
